document.full_text: few people have taken klaus-heiner lehne up on the invitation posted on his website to find out more about "europe, politics and me". if they did, they might be surprised how much the 53-year-old german fits into his working week.
document.title: special report: how lobbyists rewrite europe's laws
lines_and_colors: few people have taken klaus-heiner lehne up on the invitation posted on his website to find out more about "europe, politics and me". if they did, they might be surprised how much the 53-year-old german fits into his working week.
